description: The best and most awaited userbot made by hellboi_atul and modified by Jarvis userbot's owner(@Sppidy) Made with ‚ù§ For Support Join @Dark_cobra_support

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

F_BAN_LOGGER_GROUP.description: Put Group id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name or Username like @hellboi_atul.

AUTONAME.description: Fill your Name which will show on .autoname cmd nd used in .revert cmd when u use .clone.

ALIVE_MSG.description: Set Custom awake Message When entering .awake command.

ALIVE_PHOTTO.description: Let it be what it is(skip)..or you can change the link according to your convince..this link is useful for `.awake` command.

DEFAULT_BIO.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for pmpermit custom pic.

PM_PERMIT_GROUP_ID.description: Put an Group Id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Required For Pmpermit plugin.

CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.description: Custom middle pm permit text... May skip..doesn't really matter...

PM_DATA.description: Write DISABLE if you want to disable pm permit else leave it blank...

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background functionality. Get from https://www.remove.bg/

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Create a private group add rose  then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: create a private channel and then type .get_id add that value here for save messages

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Create a private group add rose bot then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

TAG_LOG.description: Create a group where u want ur tags logs will come add rose bot then get id ,set value, if not then leave blank

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Needed for ocr.py, get it from ocr.space .

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: for login private messages create a private channel and do .get_id and add that id

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running https://darkcobra.crazycreatorr.repl.run/

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for gitcommit plugin.Google 'Github access token' to find.

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Your repo name Example: hellboi-atul/hellboi-atul, but GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN must be setup first.

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn of inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the username of your bot

DOWNLOAD_PFP_URL_CLOCK.description: Needed for autopic module. A url that is a preview link of your Profile Pic

NO_OF_BUTTONS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In Help Command

NO_OF_COLUMS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In Help Command default 2

EMOJI_TO_DISPLAY_IN_HELP.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command You Can Add Multiple Emojies too!!

SUDO_USERS.description: Put The Id of that person whom u want to give access to use ur bot

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time for autopic get from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

REDIRECTCHANNEL.description: Put You Channel Username Reflecting Your Info or Your Tags Etc
